title: Welcome to Slide-o-Matic
subtitle: Let's get you up to speed in about 30 seconds

headline: Use arrow keys to move around →
body: That's it. Left and right arrows navigate slides.
Press **?** anytime to see all keyboard shortcuts.
Or just keep reading — you'll pick it up as you go.

headline: Press E to edit this slide right now
body: Seriously, try it. Press **E** and change this text.
You can add images, change layouts, whatever you want.

headline: Press T to open the theme drawer
body: Try randomizing or picking a new vibe.
Find one you like? It saves automatically.

headline: Press + to add a new slide
body: You'll get options: title, standard, quote, gallery, and more.
Or hold **V** and describe what you want — it'll draft it for you.
Either way works. You're in control.

headline: Hold V when you're stuck on wording
body: Describe what you want to say, let go, and it drafts suggestions.
You can tweak, reject, or keep what it gives you.
It's a helper, not the author. You're still driving.

headline: Press S to export as JSON
body: Your deck saves to JSON — clean, portable, shareable.
You can also load decks via URL: `?url=https://example.com/deck.json`
Everything stays local in your browser unless you export it.

headline: That's it. You're ready.
body: Delete these slides or keep building. Press **?** for shortcuts. Have fun.
